channel.title: Joke Thread
channel.description:
Well i dont know if this has been done before but ill make it anyway, post a joke here then rate the one above you please no spamming or this will get locked ill start us off
[b]Adam And Eve[/b] Once upon a time there was a girl named emily, Emily was not very bright and particularly hated religion One day when Emily was sitting in religion class day-dreaming the teacher asked here a question: "Who is our savior?" Emily had not heard her and didnt say anything until billy who was an annoying little boy pocked her in the back with a stick so emily shouted "Jesus Christ" "just as well you know that" replied the teacher 10 miniutes passed and emily started day dreaming again so the teacher asked Who is our father? once again billy pocked her in the back so she screamed "GOD!!" "good job emily i see your learning something" the teacher replied 10 miniutes passed the teacher knew Emily was day-dreaming once again so she asked "what did eve say to adam after their 21st child?" again billy pocked her so emily shouted at the top of her voice "IF YOU STICK THAT THING INTO ME ONE MORE TIME IM GOING TO BREAK IN HALF!!!!!!"
:eek: *Teacher faints*
well write away

item.title: Joke Thread
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

just post a joke and rate

 Three women are discussing their teenage daughters.

The first declares: “I was so shocked last week. I was tidying my daughter’'s room and I found a packet of cigarettes under her pillow. I didn’t even know that she smoked!”

“It gets worse than that,” says the second mother. “I was tidying my daughter’'s room last week and I found a bottle of vodka under her bed. I didn’t even know that she drank!”

“Oh, it gets even worse than that,” says the third mother. “I was tidying my daughter’‘s room last week and you’'ll never guess what I found in her bedside cabinet: a packet of condoms! I didn’t even know that she had a penis!”

Read full topic

item.title: Joke Thread

item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

Well i dont know if this has been done before but ill make it anyway,
post a joke here then rate the one above you please no spamming or this will get locked ill start us off

Adam And Eve
Once upon a time there was a girl named emily,
Emily was not very bright and particularly hated religion
One day when Emily was sitting in religion class day-dreaming
the teacher asked here a question:
“Who is our savior?”
Emily had not heard her and didnt say anything until billy who was
an annoying little boy pocked her in the back with a stick so emily shouted
“Jesus Christ”
“just as well you know that” replied the teacher
10 miniutes passed and emily started day dreaming again so
the teacher asked
Who is our father?
once again billy pocked her in the back so she screamed
“GOD!!”
“good job emily i see your learning something” the teacher replied
10 miniutes passed
the teacher knew Emily was day-dreaming once again so she asked
“what did eve say to adam after their 21st child?”
again billy pocked her so emily shouted at the top of her voice
“IF YOU STICK THAT THING INTO ME ONE MORE TIME IM GOING TO BREAK IN HALF!!!”

:eek: Teacher faints
